DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind study compare efficacy safety LAYLA tablet Joins tablet treatment osteoarthritis knee .
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Efficacy Safety LAYLA Osteoarthritis Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients ≥40 ≤ 80years age Radiographic evidence grade 2 3 osteoarthritis base Kellgren & Lawrene radiographic entry criterion Stable osteoarthritis 3 month Score 100mm pain VAS ≤ 80mm screen Score 100mm pain VAS ≥ 50mm baseline Written consent form voluntarily Disease spine Lower limb joint could affect evaluate efficacy History surgery arthroscopy study joint within 6 month Trauma study joint within 12 month Medication constantly ( 1 week ) corticosteroid oral within 3 month Medication intraarticular injection within 3 month Diagnosed psychical disorder , take medication History upper gastrointestinal ulceration within 6 month History upper gastrointestinal bleeding within 12 month Serum creatinine , ALT , AST , total bilirubin UNL X 2.0 screen test History hypersensitivity LAYLA , JOINS , NSAIDs Participation another clinical trial within 4 week Medication constantly ( 1 week ) narcotic analgesic within 3 month Not consent use effectual contraception method trial Pregnant lactate woman Investigator 's judgment
